testcase.name: To validate Search and Booking Hotel using valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Login Page................................................passed And User enter "ArchanaLachu" ,"9994906957".................................passed When User click Login.......................................................passed When User is in search page, User enter details for hotel search............passed And User click search button,User click Radio button and click continue.....passed Then User book the hotel by filling "archana" ,"lachu","chennai"............passed And User pay amount using "4756949674876456" ,"789","VISA","July","2024"....passed And User click booknow button and id number is generated....................passed
